hero.title: Preserving Blessings.. Creating Hope
hero.subtitle: HMD Charity acts as a bridge between surplus food and those in need

about.title: About Us
about.description: A leading charity in preserving food and distributing it to those who deserve it
about.mission_text: We strive to achieve food security by sustaining food resources and distributing them to the needy in a way that preserves their dignity.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: We provide an integrated set of services to preserve food

item1.title: Collecting Surplus Food
item1.text: Collecting surplus from restaurants, hotels, and events

item2.title: Repackaging
item2.text: Rehabilitating and packaging food in a healthy and safe way

achievements.title: Our Achievements
achievements.description: We are proud of what we have achieved together

volunteer.title: Be Part of Our Journey
volunteer.text: Help us deliver food to those in need and be part of our outstanding team
